attributes.action:
Ratify the Paris Climate Agreement & pressure Mr      
Trump into honouring it.
attributes.background: We need assurance that the climate change movement will not be halted by Trump's presidency. We ask our government to pressure Mr. Trump to honour the Paris Agreement as a matter of priority and to show determination to redouble efforts in the dire event of a U.S. withdrawal from the agreement.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/166259

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to urge the government of the USA to ratify the Paris Agreement.
